content.raw: I didn't realize they changed the joint names. That `FindJoint` function is a good move. I did a quick check of some of the inertial symmetry using the [check_inertia_symmetry script](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/8dc059f11b8ab57c75709d0809cdf1465595b309/ros/atlas_utils/scripts/check_inertia_symmetry.bash?at=default), and it looks ok. I'm going to take a look at symmetry of the effort limits.
content.html: I didn't realize they changed the joint names. That FindJoint function is a good move. I did a quick check of some of the inertial symmetry using the check_inertia_symmetry script, and it looks ok. I'm going to take a look at symmetry of the effort limits.
